item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Denise Grover Swank
item.description: "Why I waited until the last days of my life to feel pampered and beautiful. People tell themselves there’s plenty of time to do it all, but most of the time they never see death coming." -- Denise Grover Swank

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Luann McLane
item.description: "Worrying doesn’t change anything, just causes unnecessary stress." -- Luann McLane

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Erin Nicholas
item.description: "Doing something for someone because she wanted to do it instead of because she had to do it would be a welcome relief." -- Erin Nicholas

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Jennifer Probst
item.description: "Every woman should know how to make one signature dessert. Not for anyone else but herself." -- Jennifer Probst

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Julie Powell
item.description: "Maybe if the men in my life weren’t always making smart-ass comments, they wouldn’t have to worry about bruises so much." -- Julie Powell

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Julie Powell
item.description: "There are dinner parties ruined by guests, and there are dinner parties ruined by hosts, and then there are dinner parties when everyone contributes to the disaster." -- Julie Powell

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Julie Powell
item.description: "Salomé...possibly the least successful play in history." -- Julie Powell

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Linda Joyce
item.description: "She hated being late for anything; it was a sign of disrespect." -- Linda Joyce

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Karen Templeton
item.description: "And I began to realize that ultimately I was responsible for my own happiness, that blaming other people was counterproductive." -- Karen Templeton

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "They shop at Dollar Tree because they don’t want to get dressed up for Walmart." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "you got more problems than a math book" -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Maya Banks
item.description: "Love required sacrifices that were hard to make." -- Maya Banks

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Will Smith
item.description: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. But if you must lie, lie in the arms of the one you love. If you must steal, steal away from bad company. If you must cheat, cheat death. And if you must drink, drink in the moments that take your breath away" -- Will Smith

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "I don’t really care if their parents are same sex, lesbian or gay, straight, married, cohabitating, divorced, bi-racial or what. If they love and take care of them, which is basically what all children need and want, I don’t think it matters. -- Breaking Through (Military Romantic Suspense) (Book 2 of the SEAL TEAM Heartbreakers)" -- Teresa Reasor

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "We send you to awful places and ask you to do things, terrible, painful, necessary things, and then we ask you not to think about it, remember it, or internalize any of it. We ask the impossible." -- Teresa Reasor

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "You’ve done hard before. If it came easy, it wouldn’t mean as much. -- reaking Free (Military Romantic Suspense) (Book 1 of the SEAL TEAM Heartbreakers)" -- Teresa Reasor

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Luann McLane
item.description: "If you love someone, everything else is crap." -- Luann McLane

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Ruth Cardello
item.description: "Some people become family through blood. Some people through marriage. Others find their way into your life and your heart through friendship. Raise a glass to all of our family tonight…those who share our name and those who we have come to care deeply for. There is no greater fortune than to be surrounded by so much love." -- Ruth Cardello

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Ruth Cardello
item.description: "Every once in a while, life threw you an opportunity to redefine yourself. You could either rise up to the challenge or live with the regret." -- Ruth Cardello

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Ruth Cardello
item.description: "They say that courage isn’t a lack of fear. It is doing what has to be done, despite your fear." -- Ruth Cardello

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Ruth Cardello
item.description: "It’s an uncomfortable moment when you realize that there is a crazy person in the room and it’s you." -- Ruth Cardello

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Ruth Cardello
item.description: "The great part about getting older is you realize that you don't have to impress anyone else." -- Ruth Cardello

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Irene Hannon
item.description: "As she points out, leaving behind the rush-hour commute, corporate politics, and a relentless BlackBerry that never slept was no sacrifice." -- Irene Hannon

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Marion Lennox
item.description: "The measure of a life well lived is how many good dogs you can fit into it. [or cats]" -- Marion Lennox

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Patricia Kay
item.description: "You can't read all the time." -- Patricia Kay

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Dean Karlan
item.description: "Find individual programs that work, and support them. Find programs that don’t work, and stop doing them." -- Dean Karlan

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Shelli Stevens
item.description: "My friends seemed to think it was great that I had a grandma who was still comfortable with her own sexuality and even acted on it. But being on the receiving end of constant sex stories and talks about improving one’s love life just wasn’t as fabulous." -- Shelli Stevens

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Cindy Dees
item.description: "Love yourself, love life, and remember love may be waiting just around the corner for you." -- Cindy Dees

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Susan Mallery
item.description: "fifty dollars can’t change a life, but when everyone gives a little, we can change the world." -- Susan Mallery

item.title: Ann (Noumena12) add a quote by Marina Adair
item.description: "Regan did what any grown woman would do when caught committing a crime. She stepped off the toilet, shoved the flyers behind her back, and slammed the stall door. Then she sat on the toilet lid and pulled her legs up to her chest." -- Marina Adair
